name: Targets of Opportunity
flavor: You point out easy targets to your friends, allowing them to include more enemies in their attacks.

metadata.flavor: You point out easy targets to your friends, allowing them to include more enemies in their attacks.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: Each target is marked by you, and you gain two surges.

effects.name: Mark Benefit
effects.effect: Until the end of the encounter, whenever you or any ally makes a strike against a creature marked by you, you can spend 2 focus to add one additional target to the strike.
